title: A2P Day Agenda Time Table Plan
creator: Karol Depka Pradzinski

extendedInfo.description: Quick and easy personal timetable/scheduling planner app by App2Par Group (A2P for short).How about having "I will plan my time!" as a new year's resolution? :)We haven't found any other app like this, so we wrote this one - and it turns out great.This app helps You plan your time task-by-task.What makes this tool unique (e.g. different from a typical calendar/todo-list manager app), is that tasks are glued together, so when You change one task, all subsequent tasks move in time automatically.This gives You another way to get more organized and manage Your time and also keep Your motivation/discipline/focus and keep You on the right track with the goals You want to accomplish.==== Why is it useful? ===The app allows you to plan time in a more flexible and fine-grained manner than a calendar and with more precision than todo-list.The practical and psychological benefits of this approach:* planning time and a list of tasks helps keeping one's motivation/discipline. Procrastination be gone! Success literature authors, e.g. Brian Tracy advocate listing tasks for your day and "working off a list". This app goes one step further by providing a way to reality-check whether the planned tasks are going to fit into a given time-frame (e.g. a day or a free evening) and whether the tasks are gonna land at reasonable hours (e.g. whether you're not gonna end up going shopping after all shops are closed).* thanks to the ability to estimate and calculate times in the app, one can reality-check the plan whether the planned tasks will fit into the time period that is available.Although this app is general-purpose, there is a group of people who might have a particular interest in it - people with ADD/ADHD.Many users of this app, who have ADD/ADHD report increased ability to focus and ability to master time better.==== More about features ====There is an option to have notifications at the start of every task.You can share your plan/agenda with other people/apps.Works even without network connection (offline).You don't have to plan exactly one day (despite the name which is just hint). You can plan e.g. an evening/morning or even a number of consequent days (You can put "sleep" tasks to separate the days).There is a possibility to remove advertisements using an in-app purchase.Please feel free to request features - we read every e-mail and comment! Mail day.agenda.planner@gmail.com and/or leave a comment.Also it's interesting to know that the authors use the app themselves.Enjoy the app.Profiles of the people on the team (open for offers of partnerships/projects/jobs/etc.) :developers : http://www.linkedin.com/in/karoldepka , http://www.linkedin.com/pub/mateusz-ozimek/40/3a4/a1 ;tester: http://pl.linkedin.com/in/niedzialek .==== Permissions explained ====* "Network access" and "View network connections" - for displaying ad (unless ad removed via in-app purchase).* Access to SD card - for storing application's data.==== Older Changelog (for newest, see "recent changes") :== v 1.0.14; 2011-10-17* added "Set Duration" command to menu* moved "Load" menu item to "Other", to make the menu more usable== v 1.0.13; 2011-10-12* ! more touch-friendly: better dialog for setting task duration (with +/- 5/15 minutes, and resetting hrs/mins to zero)!* ! more touch-friendly: You can now enter duration dialog also by just finger-touching the hours/minutes fields in the table!* "subject line" text is also set for share/send* fixed missing app icon* command to delete all tasks (with confirmation) (in "Other")* warning when sd card is not present* new screenshots on app page== v 1.0.12; 2011-10-10* setting font size also causes column header fonts to resize proportionally (to save width)== v 1.0.11; 2011-10-08* FIX! App now also works on smaller screens (e.g. QVGA; e.g. Sony Ericsson Xperia Mini Pro, HTC Wildfire)!

reviews.title: It\'s getting worse with updates!
reviews.comment: $4 for more than one agenda. $ for this and $ for that. SLOWWWWWWW Takes over 25 seconds to load, crashes, updates mess up agendas over and over, no widget, very limited features, etc. Just create my schedules and move them to stable app where I can manipulate them and use reliable notifications etc.  Have paid 15 for apps that are great. Absolutely unreliable. This is only a good idea so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Easy and functional. Really does what I need :)

reviews.title: Clunky

reviews.author: Russel Messick

reviews.comment: This is exactly what i was looking for.Thanks a lot developers!!
reviews.author: Amit Mandhiyani

reviews.comment: Uses too much data for a scheduler.  Nearly quadrupled my data use, received warnings.\tUninstalled. ** update**   with the fixes made, reinstalled. Very slow loading, but the app is still very good.  Helps keep me on task, can set as many reminders as I can stand! Had to uninstall again..   too many bugs.
reviews.author: Chris Wolfe

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: It\'s a great program. However, it\'s crashing now after last update.
reviews.author: Tyler Gilpin

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Very useful scheduling tool, especially as a reality check that you are not timetabling too many activities in a day.
reviews.author: Carole Jackson

reviews.title: Nice however limited features
reviews.comment: Buy more for what? Use the one you have for college.
reviews.author: Roger King

reviews.title: I love this app.
reviews.comment: This app works great for a chronic procrastinator like me. I would like the ability to change the color of the screen.  The black background gets boring.
reviews.author: Carla Gibson

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: This app is very good for breaking my upcoming day into tasks.  It\'s not the prettiest of apps but don\'t let that put you off. The interface is very functional and quick to use, and that\'s the most important thing for an app like this.  Maybe an option to import some/all of your GoogleTasks would be nice... but I wouldn\'t want to over-complicate the app.
reviews.author: Padraig Crowley

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: Very simple but an excellent way of understanding and visualising the timing of multiple tasks and you progress on them.
reviews.author: Richard Moreham

reviews.comment: Up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A reality check!
reviews.comment: This app really helps me become realistic about how long tasks actually take and gradually, I\'m becoming better about planning a realistic agenda of tasks each day. I\'d love a few more features, such as the ability to move tasks from one agenda to another.
reviews.author: Terri Hine

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: After using it for some time I cannot imagine getting by without it. Regarding optional purchases - it works fine. Some people apparently didn\'t understand, that \"remove ads\" and \"multiple agendas\" are purchased separately - you just pay for what you need!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app has changed my life!
reviews.comment: I have always struggled with time management...I\'ve had this app for less than a week and now I KNOW WHY!    I use it to create a daily schedule in the morning...and throughout the day I adjust it by inputting my ACTUAL activities.  Now I know how long certain activities ACTUALLY take and I can pinpoint the things I have done that were a waste of my time.    It\'s nice that when I run into an unexpected activity...I can scan my agenda and decide what I will have to take away from in order to fit the new activity into my day.  I can\'t stress enough, how helpful this app is!!    I LOVE IT!!!  But...I want to be able to plan a few days in advance to save me some time in the morning...then just set the start time when I am ready to start my day.  But...creating a schedule every morning is actually becoming addictive and is probably good for me to do anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty great.
reviews.comment: Gets the job done. Quick and easy. Would be 5 stars if it would show up in notifications.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful app
reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing the start time limitation. Now has all the flexibility I need for planning. There\'s no other app like this out there. One of my most used apps. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where\'s the \"Paid\" version?
reviews.comment: Well? Where is it on \"Google Play\"?   I used the app to pay for the \"Select/Manage Agendas\" option and there are still ads. I\'m changing my rating from 5 stars to 3 for this. I don\'t yet know if it\'s a mistake or a weaselly move on your part because I can\'t find your pricing info and instructions spelled out anywhere. Having to email you after the fact to straighten this out is not acceptable. Other than this, this app is fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User
